query:
SELECT  ' [[Datei:item_' || items.name || '.png|zentriert|frameless|64x64px]]' AS Bild, 
  items.name AS Name, items.name AS ID,  
  '#Lang#item.' || items.name || '.desc' AS Beschreibung, 
  stacksize AS Stapelgr√∂sse, strength, 
  mass,  items.type AS Typ,  assetpath, 
  '#Version#' || items.name AS 'Ab Version' 
  FROM items  WHERE  items.type='Ore'  AND  items.name NOT NULL 
   order by name
